about_the_game:
The OST of The Adventures of Fei Duanmu:Unethical Love
The file will be downloaded in the root directory of the game, with MP3 and WAV formats


01 theme of Fei Duanmu (unethical love version)
02 snowflake
03 gangster
04 unveiling truth
05 imminent
06 foget me not
07 English association (Unethical Love Version)
08 hitodenashi
09 coffee time
10 quiet night
11 recollect
12 quiet
13 think deeply
14 crisis
15 ed

==STAFF==
Rostrum Studio
【看你不见】
Vocal : 柳知萧
Lyrics/Composer : 贺鑫
Arranger/Profome r: 荔枝虾
Vocal Post-processing : 秋山
Instrumental Post-processing : 荔枝虾
